user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me at mark.thompson@citytimes.com with insights on the immigrant community’s challenges, and let her know she can review her Gmail and Notion pages for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Insights on Challenges Faced by the Immigrant Community

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m currently working on an article for the City Times about the challenges the immigrant community is experiencing, and I would greatly value your perspective.

Whenever you have a moment, could you please share any insights or data you might have? You’re welcome to check your Gmail and Notion pages for relevant information or recent notes. 

When you’re ready, please reply directly to me at mark.thompson@citytimes.com.

Thank you so much for your help, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

Mark Thompson  
Journalist, City Times

final_output:

When you’re ready, please reply directly to me at mark.thompson@citytimes.com.

Thank you so much for your help, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
